pRuqthiqvyai svAhAq &ntari#kShAyaq svAhA# diqvE svAhAq &gnayEq svAhAq sOmA#yaq svAhAq sUryA#yaq svAhA# caqndrama#sEq svAhA &hnEq svAhAq rAtri#yaiq svAhaqrjavEq svAhA# sAqdhavEq svAhA# sukShiqtyai svAhA$ kShuqdhE svAhA# &&SitiqmnE svAhAq rOgA#yaq svAhA# hiqmAyaq svAhA# SIqtAyaq svAhA# &&taqpAyaq svAhA &ra#NyAyaq svAhA# suvaqrgAyaq svAhA# lOqkAyaq svAhAq sarva#smaiq svAhA$ || 46
(pRuqthiqvyA aqgnayE&hnEq rAtri#yaiq catu#ScatvAri(gm)Sat) (A17)
